channel.title: help|Why r the monsters so weak ><"
channel.description:
im posting it again because i posted it yesterday and it moved to the 3rd page ><" Well i saw the npc's just don't hit me.. (99def) with vesta so i removed all of my items from me and it just hit 0's (monster cb is 159) then i moved to user lvl 3 i killed the lvl 159 becasue didn't hit me he did just 0's.. how do i make'em stronger so they'll hit :O
317 server Delta Base
ty for helpers ;)

item.title: help|Why r the monsters so weak ><"
item.dc:creator: @recker450 recker450
item.description:
@recker450 wrote:

3 ways
npcagressive.java-never used before
npchandler.java(adding the attack style plus their lowest and highest damage)
npc.cfg-edit the health(works for me) (higher equals more damage)

Read full topic
